table.name: location_role_profile_cal
table.description: Defines a Location Role Profile Calendar on the Location Role. Enables defining a calendar on the Location Role based on commodity , inbound/outbound location , mode etc.

columns.name: DOMAIN_NAME
columns.description: Database domain where this data is stored.

columns.name: INSERT_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data insert user.

columns.name: INSERT_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of data insert.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data update user.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of the most recent data update.

columns.name: LOCATION_ROLE_PROF_CAL_SEQ
columns.description: The internal sequence number for the location role profile calendar combination.

columns.name: LOCATION_GID
columns.description: The GID for the location where the location role profile calendar is being defined. The location role profile calendar allow you to define different calendars for different commodity profiles (unload/load these products at these times), different inbound locations (receive shipments from these locations at these times) or outbound locations (ship product to these locations at these times.

columns.name: LOCATION_ROLE_GID
columns.description: The GID for the location role.

columns.name: FLEX_COMMODITY_PROFILE_GID
columns.description: The GID for the flex commodity profile. Used to specify when commodity specific activities can occur at the location.

columns.name: INBOUND_LOCATION_PROFILE_GID
columns.description: The GID for the inbound location profile. Used to specify when shipments from locations in the inbound location profile can be received at the location.

columns.name: OUTBOUND_LOCATION_PROFILE_GID
columns.description: The GID for the outbound location profile. Used to specify when shipments to locations in the outbound location profile can be shipped to.

columns.name: CALENDAR_GID
columns.description: The GID for the calendar entry associated with each row of the location role profile calendar entry.

columns.name: MODE_PROFILE_GID
columns.description: The GID for the mode profile. Used to specify when shipments of a certain mode can be shipped or received from the location.
